question: On which riverbanks is the center of Uppsala, Sweden located?
true_answer: The center is located on both banks of the Fyris River (Fyrisån)
asked_question_translated: ¿En qué ribera se encuentra el centro de Uppsala (Suecia)?
answer: El centro de Uppsala se encuentra en la ribera del río Fyris.
answer_translated_eng: The centre of Uppsala is located on the banks of the river Fyris.
